ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric Curse
ygData.msgSnippet: It is not area of effect... It is target only...
ygData.messageBody:
It is not area of effect... It is target only...


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Vampiric Curse
>Date: Tue, 27 Jul 1999 17:27:48 -0500
>
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>But is it area effect? If not, why the blue icon. Also, I think they
>patched out the after death bit last night, because the icon for vampiric
>curse went away after the mob I tested it on died. I'll play with it some
>more tonight when I have time and see if the health still rolls in even
>after the icon is gone.
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 4:55 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Vampiric Curse
>
>
> > From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
> >
> > Vampiric curse is actually part of the lifetap line of spells... It's is
>a
> > dot lifetap doing 200 pts of damage over sbout 45 seconds and giving the
> > health to you... The nice thig is tho (bug?) It continues to heal you
>even
> > after the target is dead...
>
>
>
